full_summary:
## Airport Tow Tractor Acquisition
### Background
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to acquire six (6) Aircraft Tow Tractors Electric Motor Driven for delivery to multiple Canadian Forces Bases (CFBs) in Canada.

### Key Information
#### Solicitation Number
W8476-236688/A

#### Tender Closing Date
23 November 2023, at 14:00:00 (local time)

#### Solicitation Documents
 Available in both official languages of Canada.

#### Contact Information

# Request for Proposal
### Pre-Qualification

* The solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers.
* To be considered, suppliers must be pre-qualified prior to submission of a proposal.

### Evaluation Criteria
The proposal will be evaluated on the basis of **lowest price**.

### Unique
